mapper.insert: insert into tb_pics (taken_dt, fl_nm, gps_la, gps_lo) values (#{taken_dt, jdbcType=DATE}, #{fl_nm}, #{gps_la, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{gps_lo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select taken_dt, count(*) as cnt from tb_pics group by taken_dt
mapper.update: update tb_pics set taken_dt = #{taken_dt} where fl_nm = #{fl_nm}
